overview: 7z is an open-source file archiver with a high compression ratio. It utilises its own 7z archive format but can read and write several other archive formats as well.
core_features: High compression ratio in 7z format with LZMA and LZMA2 compression
Supported packing / unpacking formats: 7z, XZ, BZIP2, GZIP, TAR, ZIP and WIM
Supported unpacking only: AR, ARJ, CAB, CHM, CPIO, CramFS, DMG, EXT, FAT, GPT, HFS, IHEX, ISO, LZH, LZMA, MBR, MSI, NSIS, NTFS, QCOW2, RAR, RPM, SquashFS, UDF, UEFI, VDI, VHD, VMDK, WIM, XAR and Z
Strong AES-256 encryption in 7z and ZIP formats
